bwa_mem.string_process:
process bwa_mem {
    container "${containers.bwa}"
    cpus 8
    memory "64 GB"

  input:
    file '*' from ref_indices
    file '*' from reads
  
  output:
    file "${sample_id}.sam" into sam_file
  
  script:
  """
  bwa mem -M -t 16 -p -R '@RG\\tID:${sample_id}\\tSM:${sample_id}\\tPL:Illumina' \\
        ${ref_name} \
        ${sample_id}_*1*.fastq.gz \
        > ${sample_id}.sam
  """
}

tools_dico.name: BWA
tools_dico.description: Fast, accurate, memory-efficient aligner for short and long sequencing reads

samtools_sort.string_process:
process samtools_sort {
    container "${containers.samtools}"
    cpus 8
    memory "32 GB"

    if (params.output != 'NONE') {
      publishDir "${output_dir}", enabled: params.output != 'NONE'
    }

  input:
    file "${sample_id}.sam" from sam_file
  
  output:
    file "${sample_id}.bam" into bam_file
  
  script:
  """
  samtools sort \
        -@ 16 -O BAM \
        -o ${sample_id}.bam \
        ${sample_id}.sam
  """
}

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

directive: memory "32 GB" if (params.output != 'NONE') { publishDir "${output_dir}", enabled: params.output != 'NONE' }

samtools_index.string_process:
process samtools_index {
    container "${containers.samtools}"
    cpus 8
    memory "32 GB"

    if (params.output != 'NONE') {
      publishDir "${output_dir}", enabled: params.output != 'NONE'
    }

  input:
    file "${sample_id}.bam" from bam_file
  
  output:
    file "${sample_id}.bam.bai" into bai_file
  
  script:
  """
  samtools index \
        ${sample_id}.bam
  """
}

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

directive: memory "32 GB" if (params.output != 'NONE') { publishDir "${output_dir}", enabled: params.output != 'NONE' }

MarkDuplicates.string_process:
process MarkDuplicates {
    container "${containers.gatk}"
    cpus 4
    memory "32 GB"
    
  input:
    file "*" from ref_indices
    file "${sample_id}.bam" from bam_file
    file "${sample_id}.bai" from bai_file

    output:
    file "${sample_id}_MarkDup.bam" into bam_markdup

    script:
    """
    gatk MarkDuplicates -I ${sample_id}.bam -M metrics.txt -O ${sample_id}_MarkDup.bam  
    """
}

tools_dico.name: GATK
tools_dico.description:
The Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) is a set of bioinformatic tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing (HTS) and variant call format (VCF) data. The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

BaseRecalibrator.string_process:
process BaseRecalibrator {
    container "${containers.gatk}"
    cpus 4
    memory "32 GB"
    
    input:
    file "${sample_id}_MarkDup.bam" from bam_markdup
    file '*' from ref_indices
    file '*' from ref_dict
    file '*' from ref_golden_indel
    file '*' from ref_dbsnp

    output:
    file "${sample_id}_recal_data.table" into BaseRecalibrator_table

    script:
    """
    gatk BaseRecalibrator \
    -I ${sample_id}_MarkDup.bam \
    --known-sites $dbsnp \
    --known-sites $golden_indel \
    -O ${sample_id}_recal_data.table \
    -R ${ref_name}
    """
}

tools_dico.name: GATK
tools_dico.description:
The Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) is a set of bioinformatic tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing (HTS) and variant call format (VCF) data. The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

ApplyBQSR.string_process:
process ApplyBQSR {
    container "${containers.gatk}"
    cpus 4
    memory "32 GB"
    
    input:
    file "${sample_id}_MarkDup.bam" from bam_markdup
    file "${sample_id}_recal_data.table" from BaseRecalibrator_table

    output:
    file "${sample_id}_aln-pe_bqsr.bam" into bam_bqsr

    script:
    """
    gatk ApplyBQSR -I ${sample_id}_MarkDup.bam -bqsr ${sample_id}_recal_data.table -O ${sample_id}_aln-pe_bqsr.bam
    """
}

tools_dico.name: GATK
tools_dico.description:
The Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) is a set of bioinformatic tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing (HTS) and variant call format (VCF) data. The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

HaplotypeCaller.string_process:
process HaplotypeCaller {
    container "${containers.gatk}"
    cpus 4
    memory "32 GB"
    
    input:
    file "${sample_id}_aln-pe_bqsr.bam" from bam_bqsr
    file '*' from ref_indices
    file '*' from ref_dict

    output:
    file "${sample_id}_haplotypecaller.g.vcf" into haplotypecaller_gvcf
    
    script:
    """
    gatk HaplotypeCaller -I ${sample_id}_aln-pe_bqsr.bam -O ${sample_id}_haplotypecaller.g.vcf --emit-ref-confidence GVCF -R ${ref_name}
    """
}

tools_dico.name: GATK
tools_dico.description:
The Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) is a set of bioinformatic tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing (HTS) and variant call format (VCF) data. The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

GenotypeGVCFs.string_process:
process GenotypeGVCFs {
    container "${containers.gatk}"
    cpus 4
    memory "32 GB"
        
    if (params.output != 'NONE') {
      publishDir "${output_dir}", enabled: params.output != 'NONE'
    }

    input:
    file "${sample_id}_haplotypecaller.g.vcf" from haplotypecaller_gvcf
    file '*' from ref_indices
    file '*' from ref_dict
    file '*' from ref_dbsnp

    output:
    file "${sample_id}.vcf" 
    

    script:
    """
    gatk GenotypeGVCFs  --dbsnp $dbsnp --variant ${sample_id}_haplotypecaller.g.vcf -R ${ref_name} -O ${sample_id}.vcf
    """
}

tools_dico.name: GATK
tools_dico.description:
The Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) is a set of bioinformatic tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing (HTS) and variant call format (VCF) data. The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

directive: memory "32 GB" if (params.output != 'NONE') { publishDir "${output_dir}", enabled: params.output != 'NONE' }
